title: eloyrivr

content: this is off topic but my name is Eliv I found someone via recommended on instagram hi s username was @realmatteusribeiro , I'm the type of person to instigate fights with these online gurus this user has 2 million followers ! photos in Dubai , Germany , Israel , china etcc for me he was the perfect target to clown and exposeI expose online gurus for fun, I also dm people like him to get information and debunk these gurus liesbut in the case of this Matteus guy he showed me a signed wallet with 20 million + in crypto rolexes , cash and more when I googled him, articles about his "investment bank" and "hedge fund" "e-commerce" projects came up..my question is, how does a Banker/Dropshipper/"hedge fund manager" have 20 million dollars sitting on a ledger??who is this guy? does anyone has any experience s with him? genuinely curious he blocked me after I spam Calle him on instagram.

comments.author: eloyrivr
comments.body: after private messaging him on my alt he instantly blocked me just for asking how and why he had so much in crypto / could he be a criminal? he spends time traveling a lot in south americafor me, its unbelievable and he has no reason to hav so much in crypto,after googling him it says he's worth 150 millionÂ  but not article explains deeply anything he has to do with cryptoI go after a lot of these guys on my free time but he's genuinely puzzling me
